actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 95-756.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #728 (273-131).

official_title: Resolution to provide that employees of the House Beauty Shop shall be subject to the compensation classification system established by the House Employees Position Classification Act.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 95-756) Vests the Committee on House Administration with the authority to direct and supervise the immediate management and operation of the House Beauty Shop. Amends the House Employees Classification Act to include the staff of the House Beauty Shop as employees of the House of Representatives. Provides for compensation for House Beauty Shop employees.

titles.title: Resolution to provide that employees of the House Beauty Shop shall be subject to the compensation classification system established by the House Employees Position Classification Act.
